name: BanSync
install_msg: This cog is provided as-is. It is expected to work, but will not be further enhanced as a cog for Red (see <https://github.com/mikeshardmind/SinbadCogs/blob/v3/why_no_support.md> for more details)
description: Ban a user across all servers where you can, or synchronize bans between multiple servers
